simulationModele

Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • simulationModele.Environment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Environment
extends java.lang.Thread
    A environment

    A environment consists of :

    • A Grid whose the key is a coordinate and the value a agent
    • A population
    • A width
    • A height
    • A step for the grid
    • The x-coordinate of the last point on the width
    • The y-coordinate of the last point on the height
    • A generator of random number to determine a random free point

      • moveAgent

        public void moveAgent(Coordinates coord,
             Agent agent)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Move an existing agent on the specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        coord - The coordinates where to set the agent.
        agent - The agent to set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Raise an exception if the coordinate doesn't exist on the grid. Raise an exception if the coordinate is already occupied.
        See Also:
        Coordinates, Agent

      • isFree

        public boolean isFree(Coordinates coord)
        Verify it the coordinate and its neighbourhood are free. If the coordinate is occupied else it is replaced by the occupied coordinate.(See Agent Interaction Algorithm)
        Parameters:
        coord - The coordinate to verify.
        Returns:
        True if it is free and false if not.
        See Also:
        Coordinates, Agent.wantToMove()

        protected void fireCombat(Agent winner,
              Agent loser)
        This method is called when there is a fight.
        Parameters:
        winner - : the winner of the fight who is still alive.
        loser - : the loser of the fight who is dead.
